scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cd ../frontend && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3002 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:dist: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.electron:pack: cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && electron-builder --dir
